Available.summary: Gets if busybox is available on this device.

Commands.summary: Gets a collection of the supported commands

ExecuteRootShellCommand.summary: Executes a busybox command on the device as root

ExecuteShellCommand.summary: Executes a busybox command on the device

Install.summary: Attempts to install on the device
Install.param: The path to the busybox binary to install.

Supports.summary: Gets if the specified command name is supported by this version of busybox
